stories.headline: Artemis 2 SLS wet dress rehearsal latest news: NASA begins countdown for critical fueling test
stories.description: NASA's Artemis 2 fuel test begins before its crewed moon mission in 2026.

stories.headline: We asked retired astronauts about their favorite space movies, and this is what they shared with us
stories.description: Astronauts reveal their favorite space movies, highlighting the danger and wonder of spaceflight.

stories.headline: Mike Johnson warned by Jeffries not to count on Democrats' votes to end shutdown
stories.description: "We want Republicans to carry the water," one House Democrat told Axios.
